idPartners.title: Developer
points: Reduced ~3 daily hours of manual work for the sales team through bidirectional Google Sheets ↔ Pipedrive CRM integration for Aguartec (aquaculture sector).
Implemented automation scripts with Google Apps Script that synchronize products, pricing and deals at scale via Pipedrive API.
Developed data validation and robust error handling to ensure integrity in concurrent multi-product updates.
Configured real-time synchronization through polling and automatic triggers, eliminating data inconsistencies between systems.

freelanceWebDev.title: Freelance Web Developer
points: Built professional landing page with React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS and Framer Motion. Mobile-first responsive design with performance <2s.
Managed full project lifecycle from initial brief to Vercel deployment, working directly with client.

hospitality.title: Hospitality Sector
points: 10 years developing transferable skills: management under pressure, multitasking, rapid problem-solving and attention to detail.

chefExperiencePortfolio:.name: Chef Experience Portfolio
chefExperiencePortfolio:.description: Professional landing page for chefs built with React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS and Framer Motion. Mobile-first responsive design with performance <2s. Full project lifecycle from brief to Vercel deployment.

cashRegisterSystem.name: Cash Register MVP System
cashRegisterSystem.description: Cash register system for small businesses. Atomic transactions with Prisma ensure cash open/close as all-or-nothing operations. Multiple payment methods, reports with complex SQL aggregations, transaction history with search and temporal filters. Optimistic state management with Zustand.

shiftManagementSystem.name: Shift Management System
shiftManagementSystem.description: Appointment management system for businesses with multiple employees. Conflict detection algorithm with Prisma atomic transactions prevents double-bookings. NestJS backend with Clean Architecture, RBAC with 3 roles (Admin/Employee/Client), JWT authentication with refresh tokens, and Swagger-documented API.

countriesInfoApp.name: Countries Info App
countriesInfoApp.description: Express.js backend as proxy/aggregator for external APIs (Nager.Date, CountriesNow) with fallback system for service failures. Interactive visualization of demographic data for 200+ countries with Chart.js and efficient pagination.

experienceSection.introduction: What I have done so far

hero.name: Nahuel Argañaraz
hero.description: Full Stack Developer specialized in backend, business integrations and process automation.

about.description: Full Stack Developer specialized in backend, business integrations and process automation. Recent production experience reducing 3 daily hours of manual work through Pipedrive CRM integration for Aguartec (IdParterns, Oct-Dec 2024). Build systems with complex architecture: JWT authentication, RBAC with custom Guards, conflict detection with atomic transactions. Main stack: TypeScript, NestJS, Prisma, React. Intensive training at Bootcamp Henry (+800h) with continuous self-taught specialization in scalable architectures.

works.description: A selection of projects demonstrating my experience building full-stack applications with complex architectures, API integrations, and modern frontend frameworks. Each includes source code and live deployment links.
